name: Top Anime Films (as chosen by Japanese critics and artists)
description:
Taken from lists by Shinchosha Magazine, Laputa Animation Festival, Tokyo Anime Award Festival, Cut Magazine, Animage Magazine, Kinema Junpo, and the Japan Media Arts Festival.

Original Lists:

Laputa Animation Festival:
www.nishikata-eiga.com/2010/10/laputas-top-150-japanese-and-world.html
www.nishikata-eiga.com/2011/02/30-treasures-of-world-animation.html

Shinchosha:
www.reddit.com/r/anime/comments/6z2spq/top_anime_and_anime_directors_voted_by_japanese/

Tokyo Anime Award:
otakuusamagazine.com/anime-festival-ranks-top-100-anime-of-last-100-years/

Animage:
popgeeks.com/forums/threads/animage-top-100-anime.63067/page-9

Japan Media Arts Festival:
web.archive.org/web/20110824141758/http://plaza.bunka.go.jp/hundred/list_anime.html

Cut Magazine:
patrickmacias.blogs.com/er/2006/11/mama_inai.html

Kinema Junpo:
www.nishikata-eiga.com/2010/10/kinema-junpo-top-10-animated-films-2010.html
